cause.description:
Did you know that one unit of blood can save the lives of up to 3 people? Did you know that every 3 seconds someone in the United States needs blood products? Or did you know that more than 4 million people in the U.S. would die every year if there were not volunteer blood donors? Blood donation is a safe,simple, and easy process that takes less than an hour and truly means the difference between life and death for patients across the U.S.
1. Blood donation is a selfless act that makes the world a better place.
2. We all have a responsibility to donate blood if we can.
3. Blood donors are awesome people.
cause.mission: raise awareness about the importanceof blood donation.
cause.name: Give Blood - It's about life!
